description:
Details pursuant to condition No. 5 of planning permission Ref: P/2007/3166 (works to Norwood Hall)
 a) removal of existing windows to south elevation, b) renewal of the flat roof of the building, d) simplification of external plumbing, e) modification of porch steps/proposed new wheelchair platform stairlift, f) damp penetration into basement areas, g) proposed new internal passenger lift, h) roof works to the conservatory, i) retention of the glazed clerestory to conservatory, j) replacement of the existing waney boarding to the conservatory)  for Internal and external alterations to Norwood Hall and attached conservatory (Listed Building), including the removal of two existing external staircases and erection of one replacement external staircase, installation of wheelchair platform/stairlift access to north elevation entrance, works to walled garden including landscaping, removal of greenhouses and works to walls, works within grounds including the removal of outbuildings, greenhouses and structures in conjunction with the formation of parking areas, pedestrian and vehicular routes and accesses, the erection of a part single, two and three-storey two-form entry Primary and Nursery School on the west  part of the site, and use of Norwood Hall as an Adult Education and Community Centre
